channel.title: English Assesment
channel.description:
This is what is says on the sheet
This is an Across the Board assessment task that will form part of your Yearly Assessment. It will be marked by one teacher so it is very important to ensure your name and the name of your teacher is clearly marked on your assignment. This sheet must be attached to your assignment for marking purposes. TASK On ONE sheet of A4 paper you are to create a collage (visual representation) of the concept REFLECTIONS OF AUSTRALIA’S CULTURAL IDENTITY This may include painting, drawing, cut out pictures or graphics. You are not being marked on your artistic ability but rather the thought and effort put into your representation. On the reverse side of the paper you are to explain in 300 words, in your own handwriting, why you positioned the images in the particular way to represent the concept. You might consider colour, layout, juxtaposition and reading paths (vectors).
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
Thank You In Advance,

item.title: English Assesment
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

That is an absolutely fucked up assignment.

So you have to stick some pictures of kangaroos and other retarded crap you have in australia that nowhere else has? And then write about it?

Things to stick:
Kangarooo
Koala
Excess of convict graves (edit some gravestone with a swag bag next to it)
That rock thing
Some aborigines killing them self by just thinking about it
Neighbours
BBQ
some cricket stuff

Read full topic
